tool_name: Auto Video Watermark or Subtitles Remove
tool_description: Automatically detects and removes embedded subtitles and watermarks from videos using AI technology.

api_list.name: Open Account
api_list.description: Creates a new user account for accessing the API.

api_list.name: Remove Subtitles
api_list.description: Removes watermarks and subtitles from a video.

api_list.name: Get Result
api_list.description: Retrieves the status of the video processing task.
